body: It’s projection, cucks project themselves onto these men so they can feel like that they’re the ones fucking these girls.  It’s another reason I prefer yuri and or yuri-futanari because it at least doesn’t reduce the girls down to sex toys.
@biribiri: NTR I can understand to a degree, but ugly fat guys makes no sense to me. How does the sight of these ugly motherfuckers not kill people's boners instantly?

Aaaaaand it's not. Chinese version also claims it's netorare. Holy shit what a fucking disappointment. It pisses me off when trash like this gets all the good art. Not like the doujins I prefer have art inferior to this, it's just that the art feels W A S T E D on trash like this. Fucking christ I'll say it over and over again I've never had and never will, and never will bother trying to, understand what's so fucking arousing about NTR and ugly fat men.
I'm hoping that it's at least ACTUALLY Gudao.
bless this artist kuro and jack phew
